nome: Cookies Devem Estar Ativados no Seu Navegador
html:
Cookies Devem Estar Ativados no Seu Navegador
O sistema detectou que os Cookies est√£o desativados no seu navegador de internet. Para que o nosso sistema funcione corretamente, √© necess√°rio que esteja ativado Cookies e JavaScript no seu navegador. Cada navegador tem uma forma de habilitar esta op√ß√£o. Qualquer dificuldades entre em contato com nosso suporte.

nome: Cookies Must Be Enabled in Your Browser
html:
Cookies Must Be Enabled in Your Browser
The system detected that Cookies are disabled in your internet browser. For our system to work correctly, it is necessary to have Cookies and JavaScript enabled in your browser. Each browser has a way to enable this option. Any difficulties please contact our support.

üéâ Installation Completed Successfully!

Conn2Flow has been successfully installed and configured on your server.

Next Steps:

  1. Access your site's administrative panel
  2. Configure your system preferences
  3. Customize the design and content
  4. Start using Conn2Flow!
Access Administrative Panel

This page will be automatically removed after the first access to the panel.

Sobre os Testes
  • Descoberta de Release: Testa a fun√ß√£o que busca automaticamente a √∫ltima tag de plugin em um reposit√≥rio GitHub
  • Download de Release: Testa o download de um arquivo ZIP de release do GitHub
  • Processamento de Origem: Testa a l√≥gica completa de processamento de uma URL de origem

ZIP File Public Repository Private Repository
Select the .zip file containing the plugin
Enter the GitHub repository URL. The system will automatically discover the latest release version of the plugin.
For private repositories, provide a valid access token. The system will automatically discover the latest release version.

ZIP File Public Repository Private Repository
Select the .zip file containing the plugin
Enter the GitHub repository URL. The system will automatically discover the latest release version of the plugin.
For private repositories, provide a valid access token. The system will automatically discover the latest release version.

About the Tests
  • Release Discovery: Tests the function that automatically searches for the latest plugin tag in a GitHub repository
  • Release Download: Tests downloading a ZIP file from GitHub release
  • Source Processing: Tests the complete logic of processing a source URL
